chit.a: lvl X - set character level to X
sp X - add X skill points
pp X - add X perk points
money X - set the amount of caps to X
item ID X - set the quantity of item ID to X
ammo ID X - set the quantity of ammo ID to X
skill ID n - set skill ID to n (0-20)
testeff - all effects will be 10 times shorter
crack X - damage weapons by X%
break X - damage armor by X%
lim X - set the special loot limit to X%
mana X - set mana to X
goto X Y - move to room with coordinates X Y
fly - can enable flight with the ~ key
emit X - summon particle X with the ~ key
st X Y - set trigger X to value Y
trigger X - get the value of trigger X
